XMoto.io

Hi, I'm Michaël Hoste, a Ruby on Rails & CoffeeScript developper from 80LIMIT, a Belgium-based company. I like to create games on my spare time, so I decided to write this blog about the development, step by step, of a HTML5 version of XMoto.
